mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT i.id,i.`buyer_user_id`,d.`det_pro_name`,d.`product_speciname` ,i.income_commission,i.`income_integral`, i.income_money,i.income_time,i.income_type,i.is_get ,i.commission_type FROM t_mall_seller_income i LEFT JOIN t_mall_order_detail d ON d.id=i.`order_detail_id` LEFT JOIN t_mall_order o ON o.id=i.order_id WHERE (i.income_type=2 AND (d.`id` > 0 AND d.status != 5 AND d.status != 1 AND o.`order_status`< 5) OR i.income_type=1)
and i.sale_member_id = #{saleMemeberId}
and
i.sale_member_id = #{item,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and i.income_commission > 0
and i.income_integral > 0
and i.income_money > 0
and i.is_get = #{i.getType}
and (i.is_get = -1 or i.is_get = 0 )
and i.is_get = 1
and i.is_get = -2

select
from t_mall_seller_income where sale_member_id = #{saleMemberId} and income_commission > 0 and is_get = 0 AND no_receive_commission > 0
